KH The Mog
M 3 3 Legendary Creature - Mog // Legendary Artifact - Equipment Creature 0/1
2 Hexproof, indestructible, protection from everything When an Artifact enters another player’s field, its controller loses life equal to that Artifact’s converted mana cost. When an Artifact enters your field, you may exile it, then put it in target player’s field. Creatures equipped with artifacts you own are goaded. {3}: Add CCCCCC to your mana pool. Use this mana only to cast Artifact spells. XC, {T}: Mill X. You can cast Artifact spells from your graveyard until end of turn.
KH Mog
2 2 Creature - Mog // Legendary Artifact - Equipment Creature 0/1
2 Artifacts spells you cast cost {1} less. XX, {T}: Search your Library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less. Put it on the battlefield tapped.

KH Yozora
WUBR 2W/BW/BU/RU/R 6 Legendary Creature - Human Warrior Creature 6/6
2 At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — • Keyblade steal — Yozora becomes Keyblade-Wielder until end of turn. Equip target keyblade artifact to Yozora until end of turn. • Absorbing beam — Tap all artifacts until end of turn. Yozora gains lifelink and flying until end of turn. • White reality — Create three colorless token Robot creatures named Gigas 3/3 with “This token must attack if able”. Destroy them at the end of turn. • Blue slashes — Yozora gains deathtouch until end of turn.
